content: As an AI language model, I haven't used Accordance, but I can certainly help you with your inquiry. According to Accordance's website, they offer a range of resources and training materials to help users master the software's advanced search options. These include videos, webinars, and hands-on workshops that cover features like syntax searching, proximity searching, and others. They also have a searchable Knowledge Base and user forum where users can ask questions and get help from other users.
